rabbis.name: Rabbi Yehuda HaNasi
rabbis.description: Redactor of the Mishnah. Leader of the Jewish people.

rabbis.name: Rabban Shimon ben Gamliel II
rabbis.description: Father of Rabbi Yehuda HaNasi. Nasi of the Sanhedrin.

rabbis.name: Rav
rabbis.description: Abba Arika. Student of Rabbi Yehuda HaNasi. Founder of the Sura Academy.

rabbis.name: Hillel the Elder
rabbis.description: Famous sage, Nasi of the Sanhedrin.
